entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
